query: What is Permatex Surface Insensitive Threadlocker Blue?
text_label: Permatex Medium Strength Threadlocker Blue Gel Twist Applicator puts the threadlocker where you want it. The gel formula provides 'liquid-reliability' without drips, globs, mess or waste. This all-purpose, medium strength threadlocker is ideal for all nut and bolt applications 1/4 inch to 1 inch (6mm to 25mm) and eliminates the need for stocking expensive lock nuts and lock washers. This will lock and seal while preventing parts from loosening due to vibration, as well as protect threads from corrosion. Removable with hand tools for easy disassembly. Applied as a liquid or gel, threadlockers are superior to conventional lock washers, nylon inserts, and other mechanical devices because they secure the entire fastener assembly against loosening from shock and vibration by filling the space between threaded metal parts, curing to form a tough, adhesive bond and seal. They also seal the threads against leakage, preventing rust and corrosion.

query: If I want adhasives weaker than LOCTITE 271 , what is the product recommendation?
text_label: LOCTITE 243 is a medium strength threadlocking adhesive that seals and secures metal nuts and bolts to prevent loosening due to shock and vibration. It is designed for the locking and sealing of threadedfasteners which require normal disassembly with standard handtools. The product cures when confined in the absence of airbetween close fitting metal surfaces. LOCTITE 243 works on all metals, including passive substrates such as stainless steel, aluminium and plated surfaces. It is proven to be tolerant of minor contamination due to industrial oils.

OSiS Dust is a lightweight mattifying powder that delivers instant volume, texture, and a natural matte finish. With flexible hold and easy application, this styling essential is perfect for creating modern, touchable hairstyles. Texture and volumizing hold last for up to 24 hours with a light matte finish.
Notes: Products from Henkel non-adhesive business unit

text_label:
LOCTITE 401 is a fast-fixturing instant adhesive designed for the assembly of difficult-to-bond materials which require uniform stress distribution and strong tension and/or shear strength. The product provides rapid bonding of a wide range of materials, including metals, plastics and elastomers. It is also suited for
 bonding porous materials such as wood, paper, leather and fabric.

query: Can you recommend medium strength threadlocking adhesive bestseller？

text_label:
LOCTITE® 567™ is designed for the locking and sealing of metal
tapered threads and fittings. The product cures when confined in the
absence of air between close fitting metal surfaces and prevents
loosening and leakage from shock and vibration. LOCTITE® 567™
provides robust curing performance. The high lubricating properties
of this compound prevent galling on stainless steel, aluminum and
all other metal pipe threads and fittings. It not only works on active
metals (e.g. brass, copper) but also on passive substrates such as
stainless steel and plated surfaces. The product offers high
temperature performance and oil tolerance. It tolerates minor
surface contaminations from various oils, such as cutting,
lubrication, anti-corrosion and protection fluids. LOCTITE® 567™ is
recommended for industrial applications in the chemical processing,
petroleum refining, pulp/paper, waste treatment, textile,
utilities/power generation, marine, automotive, industrial equipment,
gas compression and distribution industries. It is also recommended
for industrial plant fluid power systems.
